DOC.brief_summary: Teaching program population : Participants Hadassah Ein Kerem ultrasound training day - Anesthesia resident Exclusion criterion : Refusal participate , insufficient understand write English use questionnaire Stage 1 - train The aim requirement teach program explain participant start workshop . All participant give sticker number questionnaire number current ultrasound practice number accord participant number allow blind . Anyone wish participate either remove sticker return questionnaire end session . The number questionnaire correlate participant number . This recorded participant name allow follow . All participant rotate normally throughout session . At end neuraxial session participant score session leader accord ability adequately carry procedure . Scores correlate participant number . Stage 2 - assessment skill retention Following training day participant randomly allocate two group . One group receive regular reminder use ultrasound neuraxial anesthesia perform OR labor ward . They remind regular basis ultrasound new tool assist perform neuraxial ultrasound . The group allow continue regular practice receive reminder use ultrasound neuraxial anesthesia insertion . Two month initial train day participant observe perform neuraxial anesthesia re-assesed accord original scoring system . Each participant assess 3 time 6 month period .
DOC.criteria: Practicing anesthesiologist level Hadassah Ein Kerem hospital Unwillingness complete questionnaire , poor English comprehension
